short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CPU, memory, and bandwidth usage monitor for Chrome tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
REQUIRES DEV CHANNEL CHROME -- Will not work with stable Chrome due to the lack of the `processes` API.

CPU, memory, and bandwidth usage monitor for Chrome tabs.  Rows can be clicked to navigate to the offending tab.
